thread.title: 10 Baltimore Restaurant Week menus that stand out
thread.title_full: 10 Baltimore Restaurant Week menus that stand out

title: 10 Baltimore Restaurant Week menus that stand out
text:
10 Baltimore Restaurant Week menus that stand out The newcomer: Bar Vasquez Kenneth K. Lam / Baltimore Sun Baltimore, MD.--11/22/16-- Asado is pictured for restaurant review of Bar Vasquez located at 1425 Aliceanna Street. Baltimore Sun: Kenneth K. Lam KKL_4752 lt-bar-vasquez-review Lam Baltimore, MD.--11/22/16-- Asado is pictured for restaurant review of Bar Vasquez located at 1425 Aliceanna Street. Baltimore Sun: Kenneth K. Lam KKL_4752 lt-bar-vasquez-review Lam (Kenneth K. Lam / Baltimore Sun) Unique ingredients: Bookmakers Cocktail Club Colby Ware / For The Baltimore Sun 
Bookmakers Cocktail Club in Federal Hill has one of the most unique menu offerings of this year's winter restaurant week participants: crispy frog legs. Other first-course choices on the restaurant's $35 three-course dinner menu include oxtail stew and kale Caesar salad; second courses include chicken and dumplings, braised lamb shank and roasted ratatoulle; and double chocolate bread pudding and candied toast are among the dessert offerings. 
(31 E. Cross St.; 443-438-4039; bookmakersbaltimore.com ) 
Bookmakers Cocktail Club in Federal Hill has one of the most unique menu offerings of this year's winter restaurant week participants: crispy frog legs. Other first-course choices on the restaurant's $35 three-course dinner menu include oxtail stew and kale Caesar salad; second courses include chicken and dumplings, braised lamb shank and roasted ratatoulle; and double chocolate bread pudding and candied toast are among the dessert offerings. 
(31 E. Cross St.; 443-438-4039; bookmakersbaltimore.com ) (Colby Ware / For The Baltimore Sun) See more galleries 
Baltimore Winter Restaurant Week runs Jan. 13-22, when more than 100 restaurants across the city will offer two-course brunches and lunches for $20 or less, and three-course dinners for $35 and under. 
We scoured the menus of participating restaurants, searching for the most eye-catching items, and chose 10 that stood out for their uniqueness and value. Scroll through the gallery above for the restaurants and their menu highlights. Full menus for all participating menus are available at baltimorerestaurantweek.com . Sarah Meehan
